Package de.systemagmbh.interfaces.bus

Interface Summary
ISysBus The ISysBus interface defines the Methods of the event driven Model for a Messagebus.
ISysBusEvent An Event constructed to pass ISysBus Events.
ISysBusEventListener An ISysBusEventListener defines the methods all event listener interfaces for ISysBusEvents must extend.
ISysBusManager  
ISysSubject A ISysSubject is an Object that handles and defines the Subjectadress of a message.
 

Class Summary
FSysBus The factory class for busses.
 

Exception Summary
CSysBusException This is the implementation of ASysException for the bus.
